name: Dragon Zumu: Shooting
description:
Once you start, you can not stop!

It's maybe the best marble game on ipad&iPhone, and it is free.

Million of people love this game and are addicted on it.

How to play?

Destroy marbles by forming groups of 3 or more marbles in the same color.

Game features:

============================================
+ Fully designed for iPad & iPhone
+ An exciting ,replayable,fun Blitz mode
+ Dozens of exciting levels offering you an unforgettable gaming experience
============================================
